nodes.bodyText: Would you mind moving this into deps?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -39,7 +39,7 @@ dependencies {
 
   compile deps.slf4j
   compile group: 'org.msgpack', name: 'msgpack-core', version: '0.8.20'
-  compile group: 'com.squareup.okhttp3', name: 'okhttp', version: '3.11.0' // Last version to support Java7
+  compile group: 'com.squareup.okhttp3', name: 'okhttp', version: '3.12.8' // 3.12.x is last version to support Java7
